# GitHub Release Template

When creating a new release on GitHub, use this template for the release description:

## What's New?

### ğŸ› Bug Fixes
- [List each bug fix with a brief description]
- Example: Fixed Surface Mining layout - all 17 minerals now display correctly

### âœ¨ New Features
- [List each new feature]
- Example: Added "Report a Bug ğŸ›" button in top-right header

### ğŸ¨ UI Improvements
- [List UI enhancements]
- Example: Improved visual clarity across all views

---

## Example for v1.1.9:

## What's New?

### ğŸ› Bug Fixes
- Added missing Borase mineral to Asteroid Mining view
- Added 6 ROC minerals to Cargo Calculator (Hadanite, Dolivine, Aphorite, Janalite, Beradom, Feynmaline)

---

**Note:** This content will automatically appear in the "Update Available" popup window when users launch the app.
